content.rendered:
Representing Columbus Residents Since 1968

Since 1968, our team at Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, has been helping individuals in Columbus, Ohio, and surrounding areas find solutions to a wide range of legal issues. Along with personal injury matters involving auto accidents, doctor malpractice and nursing home negligence, we often assist individuals with other legal matters, including:

Insurance Disputes

In many cases, insurance companies question claims and even deny individuals rightful compensation for an injury. Our attorneys work with many insurance companies on behalf of those insured to deal with insurance bad faith claims, claims involving life insurance and uninsured/underinsured motorist coverage issues.

Investor Claims

Our lawyers also handle matters for individuals who have suffered financial losses due to negligent actions, fraud or mismanagement by financial planners, accountants or stockbrokers in handling retirement accounts, including IRAs and 401(k)s.

Product Liability

Our team has also recovered for individuals who have been injured due to hazardous, defective products. We handle cases involving defective drugs and medical devices, hazardous tools and construction equipment, dangerous toys and other children’s products, and defective automobile air bags, among others.

Property Injuries

Our team also helps individuals recover for injuries suffered on others’ property as a result of the action or inaction of the property owner or property managers. We often help individuals recover for dog bite injuries, fire and gun injuries, and injuries that stem from a failure to install adequate lighting or security measures.

If You Need A Legal Team With A Trusted Reputation, Contact Us

With over 100 years of combined legal experience, our team of attorneys has earned respect among the community and colleagues and has recovered multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlements through the years. Rest assured that our law firm has the skill, experience, knowledge and track record of success to help you.

Call 614-360-2706 today. You can also send an email.
